original_text: saying to them, “Go to the village ahead of you, and just as you enter it, you will find a colt tied there, which no one has ever ridden. Untie it and bring it here.
korean_text: 이르시되 너희는 맞은편 마을로 가라 그리로 들어가면 곧 아직 아무도 타 보지 않은 나귀 새끼가 매여 있는 것을 보리니 풀어 끌고 오라

sentences.original_text: Go to the village ahead of you
and just as you enter it
you will find a colt tied there
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 거기 묶인 나귀 새끼를 발견할 것이다

sentences.original_text: which no one has ever ridden
